thread.title: Facebook is down, sound the alarm
thread.title_full: Facebook is down, sound the alarm

author: Bryan Clark
title: Facebook is down, sound the alarm
text: Share on Twitter (10) Bryan Clark is a reporter from San Diego, CA. Happy to hear your thoughts on or @bryanclark on Twitter. Bryan Clark is the US Editor, a California resident, and a believer that the West Coast truly is the best coast. He digs web culture, social media, and inappropriate use of GIFs during otherwise serious conversation. Connect via Twitter or Facebook . Contact
